dtliExcerpt: Both monologues are beautifully written and movingly performed, creating an evening that is both intimate and universal in its exploration of love, loss, and the fragility of life.
bwwExcerpt: At one point in Sea Wall, Alex refers to the cruelest thing he ever said; in A Life, Abe mentions the kindest thing anyone ever said to him.
